General.Name: Femto Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Femto Technologies Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops, markets, and sells client relationship management (CRM) software in Israel. The company offers Benefit CRM, a proprietary CRM software. It also develops Sensera device, a patent pending device combined with proprietary software, regulates the flow of low-concentration CBD oils into the soft tissues of the female sexual organs; and Cannabis CRM Platform, a CRM software platform to serve the needs of the medical cannabis sector. The company was formerly known as BYND Cannasoft Enterprises Inc. and changed its name to Femto Technologies Inc. in July 2024. Femto Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Kiryat Motzkin, Israel.

3.Name: Mr. Avner  Tal
3.Title: VP of Sales & Marketing, CTO and Director
